alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Worcester, southeastern Hampshire, southeastern Franklin and northeastern Hampden Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 519 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Hadley, or near Holyoke, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Holyoke, Amherst, Northampton, Ludlow, South Hadley, Belchertown, Palmer, Ware, Granby, Hadley, Warren, West Brookfield, Brimfield, Hardwick, Pelham, Petersham, New Braintree and New Salem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for western and central Massachusetts.
